snippet: O.M.G.! I spotted Geoff Dyer, the famous author and critic, just three seats down from me! Really curious to know what he thinks of that short story that I've been working on.
abstract: O.M.G.! I spotted Geoff Dyer, the famous author and critic, just three seats down from me! Really curious to know what he thinks of that short story that I've been working on.

byline.original: By CHRISTOPH NIEMANN and JON HUANG
